extendedInfo.description: Tennis in first person.First Person Tennis 2â¢ is the first videogame in the world developed only with a first person perspective to give you a realism ever seen.â CHARACTERISTICS: Explode your top spins, forehands, backhands and try to win one of the tournaments. Choose how many sets to play in a match and select the difficulty level. Calibrate your shots and feel the sensation to hit a winner on a tennis court. Feel the power of your shots by vibration; trail effect will make your shots more spectacular!â TOUR MODE: Try to become the Worldâs Number 1 playing all 13 real tournaments and breaking your personal records!â EXHIBITION MODE: Choose a court and play an instant match.â INTUITIVE CONTROLS: Swipe controls or virtual joypad.â 5 DIFFERENT COURTS: Grass, Clay, Carpet, Hard, Indoor. Each one with a different bounce!For any suggestion contact us at: firstpersontennis@gmail.comYour suggestions will be soon applied. Help us to reach a really incredible realism!Keywords:First, person, tennis, tennis, tennis, tennis, slam, score, federer, nadal, djokovic, wimbledon, us, open, flick, atp, wta, australian, roland, garros.

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Grand
reviews.comment: Nice game. Will definitely keep you glued for a long time. However, needs a bit work on the graphics part but thats still okay. Enjoy!!
reviews.author: Marsh Rodrigues

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Very nice game, good control, challenging.
reviews.author: Vincenzo Selvaggio

reviews.title: Need update
reviews.comment: The game needs a lot of improvments and better controls....more tournamets..... And how to move the player? Till then i will refund it
reviews.author: Josip Mandic
